title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Deployment and DevOps', which statement about dockerizing streamlit is most accurate?
choices: Dockerizing Streamlit always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Dockerizing Streamlit is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Dockerizing Streamlit is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Dockerizing Streamlit only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Dockerizing Streamlit is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
